name: changelog-gen
description: Small Utility to generates Changelog files

scripts.bin:concatenate:js: cat src/boot.js >> bin/changelog && cat src/git_utils.js >> bin/changelog && cat src/markdown_utils.js >> bin/changelog && cat src/changelog.js >> bin/changelog
scripts.bin:make: npm run bin:pragma && npm run bin:concatenate:js && npm run bin:permissions
